meanings.definition: No commonly-used, simple dictionary definitions of the word 'rorty' could be found.
meanings.sent1: The colorful and rorty flowers brightened up the garden.
meanings.sent2: The party had a rorty atmosphere with lively music and laughter.
meanings.sent3: The rorty decorations made the room look like a playful wonderland.
meanings.sent4: Her rorty personality always brought joy to those around her.
meanings.sent5: The rorty painting seemed to dance with vibrant energy.
